name: Positron (itch)
description:
Positron is a on going project based on my LD35 entry (ShapeMagnet).

Navigate through a chaotic space with attractive and repulsive forces to find escape to neutrality.

This is a solo project that I plan to document all my process from the beginning through a weekly devlog describing all aspects of the development.

Controls
  • Arrows - Move
  • Spacebar - Change polarity
  • Esc - Reset level
Version: 0.0.1

Basic functionality with 3 simple levels.

Linux and Mac builds not tested.
